post.text: Donald Trump spent five years lying about President Obama's citizenship. He can't just take that back.

comment.author: Tory
comment.text: Proof that Donald Trump is a racist this is what he said about the presidential candidate Obama in 2008 "A few years ago this guy would have been carrying our bags" Oops I'm sorry it was actually Bill Clinton that said that not Donald Trump my mistake

replies.author: Scott
replies.text: Trevor true. That lie has been debunked some time ago. Neither Clinton said that. SMDH

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Tiana show where it was debunked?
